description:
High comfort and smooth cushioning for rough paths. With its rubber toe and heel caps, the Lhasa II also provides additional protection on rocky trails. Underfoot, the supportive, sure-grip Vibram® AW Integral sole has a special trekking profile with impact and braking tread blocks for steep ascents and descents.

With its supple yak leather upper, soft leather cuff and very comfortable footbed, this high-quality boot makes trekking feel like walking on air, whether in Tibet or wherever in the world it might take you.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Lhasa II - Mens
